mapper.select: select lc.*, sp.policy_title, sp.standard, ol.reg_date from license lc, subscription_policy sp, order_list ol where lc.policy_no = sp.no and lc.user_admin_no = #{adminNo} and lc.order_no = ol.no
select gu.*, ag.last_login from agent ag, general_user gu where ag.license_no = #{licenseNo} and ag.user_no = gu.no

select gu.*, ag.last_login from agent ag, general_user gu where ag.license_no = #{licenseNo} and ag.user_no = gu.no and gu.email like CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%') and gu.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') and gu.dept_name like CONCAT('%', #{dept}, '%') and last_login between to_timestamp(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_timestamp(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

select gu.*, ag.last_login from agent ag, general_user gu where ag.license_no = #{licenseNo} and ag.user_no = gu.no and gu.email like CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%') and gu.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') and gu.dept_name like CONCAT('%', #{dept}, '%')
